title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 142-3.13 - Nonprofitmaking institution
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 142-3.13 - Nonprofitmaking institution

State Regulations
A
nonprofitmaking institution
means
any corporation, unincorporated association, community chest, fund or
foundation organized and operated exclusively for religious, charitable or
educational purposes, no part of the net earnings of which inures to the
benefit of any private shareholder or individual. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
142-3.13

Amended

New

York State Register December 28, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 52, eff. 12/31/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
